details:
noun
- the faculty of bodily perception
= synonyms: somesthesis, somaesthesia, somaesthesis, somatesthesia, somataesthesis, somatosensory system, somatic sensory system, somatic sense
- the perception of tactual or proprioceptive or gut sensations
= example: the perception of tactual or proprioceptive or gut sensations
= synonyms: somaesthesia, somatesthesia, somatic sensation
